section.title: Course Description
section.p: Taken from the official PCC course description:

Includes infinite sequences and series (emphasis on Taylor series), an introduction to differential equations, and vectors in three space. Graphing calculator required. TI-89 Titanium or Casio Classpad 330 recommended. Prerequisites: MTH 252 and its prerequisite requirements. Audit available. This is the third course of four courses in the Calculus sequence.
The complete Course Content and Outcome Guide can be found at www.pcc.edu/ccog/default.cfm?fa=ccog.
